text: Aldo Moser (7 February 1934 – 2 December 2020) was an Italian cyclist. Moser rode in 16 editions of the Giro d'Italia and 4 of the Vuelta a España, totaling in 20 Grand Tours. He was the older brother of Francesco Moser, Enzo Moser and Diego Moser. He was born in Giovo, Italy. Moser died on 2 December 2020 in Trento, Italy from COVID-19 at the age of 86.Covid, morto Aldo Moser, capostipite di una dinastia di fuoriclasse del ciclismo ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian cyclists Category:People from Trentino-Alto Adige/Südtirol Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy
title: Aldo Moser
